name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CashBack+ Pay brought to you by Prizeout

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Earn instant cashback on your everyday online shopping. Available exclusively to select credit union members.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing CashBack+ Pay brought to you by Prizeout, your ultimate browser extension for instant cashback. Get notified of offers at checkout as you shop, and earn cashback when you pay with CashBack+ Pay. Exclusively for select credit union members!

To get started, simply:
1. Download the CashBack+ Pay Chrome browser extension.
2. Link it to your credit union account through the online banking app.
3. Browse and shop online as usual.
4. Pay with CashBack+ Pay to instantly earn cashback from top merchants like Amazon, Nike, Best Buy, and more.

Your cashback will be instantly added to your account. No exclusions, and no waiting period.

Whether it's everyday essentials or a special treat, CashBack+ Pay helps you earn cashback as you shop online. Download today and discover how Membership Pays with CashBack+ Pay!
